item.title: Old School Mini Mix....by DJ Scorpio..Da Zodiac Killa.
item.description: This is one of my shows from a radio mixshow I was doing...let me know what you think...
item.dc:creator: DJ Scorpio
item.itunes:summary: This is one of my shows from a radio mixshow I was doing...let me know what you think...

item.title: The Oldschool Lunchbreak Powermix with DJ Scorpio 08-17-98
item.description:
Here's a new edition...fresh off the presses.  This mix includes classic hip hop and R&B.  Check out Jeff 'Red, Patti LaBelle, Queen Latifah, Dominoe, Tammy Lucas, UMCs and others.  Also, let me know what you think about the new intro I just got from my friend Melanie, her voice is just as beautiful as she is!

 

Get at me.

 

DJ Scorpio

djscorpio@swurvradio.com
item.dc:creator: DJ Scorpio

item.title: The Old School Lunchbreak Powermix June 12, 2008
item.description:
Hey, this edition is straight hip hip, with music from Fu Snickens, Black Moon, LOTUG (true hip hop heads know who this is) to name a few. Also, I take it from the east to the west with Self Destruction and We're All in the Same Gang.
This show plays M-Th at 12 pm Pacific/3 pm Eastern. Make your requests at djscorpio@swurvradio.com and I'll put your voice on my show.
Hit me with feedback and as always...thanks for your support!

item.title: The Old School Lunchbreak Powermix 2
item.description: Hey...I just started doing a old school mix on www.swurvradio.com weekdays at 12pm PST/3pm EST call The Old School Lunchbreak Powermix! It's a mix of classic hip hop, R&B, disco, funk, house and whatever else I can think of! Make your request at djscorpio@swurvradio.com. Get at me
